summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 5.0°C) and outside temperature (down 4.6°C), more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 9%), and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.2 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in rainfall (up 0.2 mm), cloud levels (up 729 m), and light levels (up 6164 lux).

The past week and month had observable variation in rainfall (up 0.2 mm), cloud levels (up 1676 m), and light levels (up 8087 lux) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 728.9m lower than yesterday, 646.9m lower than the past week, 1675.8m lower than the past month.

The cloud levels for yesterday ranged from 1059m to 3380m and averaged 995.4m, while the past week and month indicated warmer conditions.
cloud levels.summary: Cloud cover will be variable, overcast at times.

summary.summary: Inside; temperature should feel pleasantly mild. Outside; mild and pleasant. Also, air moisture should feel ok. Possible light showers, cloud cover will be variable, overcast at times, and periods of sunshine are expected. Weather could become unsettled.
